synopsis.text:
One day, in a magical realm where sisters Yoyo and Nene work as magical curse-breakers, a colossal tree emerges from the forest, tangled with unfamiliar, towering structures. Driven by curiosity, the sisters venture to investigate, only to find themselves transported to an unfamiliar world: modern-day Japan.

Yoyo, separated from her sister, encounters two startled children who rush home, only to discover their parents transforming into monstrous creatures. Meanwhile, Nene remains in the magical realm, negotiating with a woman seeking her long-lost witch sister.

In an unexpected turn of events, Yoyo finds herself tasked with breaking the curse on the children's parents, all while navigating the unfamiliar landscape of modern Japan. This enchanting tale, based on Hirarin's manga 'Noroiya Shimai', weaves together elements of magic, mystery, and family bonds, promising an enthralling journey for its viewers.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
